column4: dns has one purpose, map human readable names to ip addresses
no an internet dns does not resolve a name to an internet non-routable address
the point is, he is trying to get to his router via an ip address
to which, dns has no part
i have tried restarting, but nothing has changed
could it have to to with the DHCP settings?
I only have one router, could I still have 2dhcp's?
yes I am sure it is still on, i have just checked
like a little box plugged into the wall downstairs
what is this little box you speak of ?
did you see Stagger_Lee just left the room? was i still logged in from before???
